evidence.claim: Anywhere Audiology uses AWS services for application hosting and management.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its data handling processes.
Integration with electronic health record (EHR) systems is supported, compliant with FHIR standards.
Anywhere Audiology employs robust webhooks for real-time data updates.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse capabilities on their site.
